name: Dazzle (Hours Jeremy, Neez, BaeSama, Δ E U S | roaring lion)
name_original: Dazzle (Hours Jeremy, Neez, BaeSama, Δ E U S | roaring lion)
description:
Dazzle is a card game designed to be played in local by two players.

In this cyberpunk universe, you embody the leader of your city. To reach your objectives, you have to do everything to beat your opponent in this cold war ambiance.
developers: Δ E U S | roaring lion
